title: MD
biography: Wander Samuel Franco Aybar, nicknamed "El Patron", is a Dominican professional baseball shortstop for the Tampa Bay Rays of Major League Baseball (MLB). He made his MLB debut in 2021 and was an All-Star in 2023.
aiSummary: R. S. Wander is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 132 at Interventional cardiology (Member). Has been published in Nature Physics, Nature Communications. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
